review.title: “Fought the good fight for a good and worthy cause but became a casualty due to politics and poor leadership.”
review.pros: Pros – Providing service to the underserved.
review.cons: Cons – Highly political - it is all about who you know.Poorly managed - administration turnover is 2:1 in the almost nine years I was there.Incompetence is rewarded - so long as it is passed-on and done correctly by someone else.Poor compensation & benefits - HR has a bad image within the institution.
